about_the_game:
"Path of Yuusha" is a simulation game set in the Yuusha academy with life sim elements of decorating your room freely and attempting events at local town. Experiencing the daily life of a school student who is busy with classes and work, Manages your weekly schedule and cultivates your character into a splendid hero.

Manage Your Schedule

Plan your weekly schedule and adjust it according to your character's needs, whether it's learning spells in the magic academy, practice alchemy in the witch's hut, working at local restaurant as a waiter or just simply stay at home watching TV.

Decorate Your Lovey Home

Decorate your own Home with various furniture and invite your friends to your home on the weekend. Those furniture are not only cute and good looking, it will provide different types of benefit to enhance your character.

Cute Pets

You can catch and taming different kind of pet in Path of Yuusha, every pet will have its own unique expertise, some can help you defeat monsters in dungeon, some can help you grow herbs in your backyard.

Adventure with your Friends

Dungeon are full of Monsters and Treasures, meet with other adventurers in the Adventures' guild to venture together deep in to the dungeon, looting and defeating the monsters, collecting weapon and armor to enhance your character.

name: Path of Yuusha

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "Path of Yuusha" is a simulation game set in the Yuusha academy with life sim elements of decorating your room freely and attempting events at local town. Experiencing the daily life of a school student who is busy with classes and work, Manages your weekly schedule to become a splendid hero.
